de.mpa.db.job.instances

Class DeleteJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mpa.db.job.Job
      • de.mpa.db.job.instances.DeleteJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Executable, Runnable

    public class DeleteJob
extends Job
    Wrapper job class for executing a bash script to recursively delete files in a folder and its subfolders: clearfolders.sh: find /folder/subfolder -type f -exec rm -f {} \;
    Author:
    T.Muth
